title: Webique Agency
description: Founded agency specializing in custom web applications and SaaS solutions across multiple industries. Led end-to-end project delivery from consultation to deployment, managing 20+ projects. Established development workflows, built client relationships, and delivered scalable solutions using modern frameworks.

title: Dual SOFT
description: Built high-performance Angular application with real-time WebSocket integration for live odds updates. Implemented state management, Redis-based session handling, and optimized rendering for data-intensive interfaces. Ensured consistent performance under heavy concurrent traffic loads.

title: iMET
description: Developed university platform serving 20,000+ users with Angular frontend and Spring Boot backend. Created Python/Flask service for automated analytics and reporting. Implemented RBAC, multi-tenant architecture, and third-party integrations enabling scalable feature deployment.
